rows.label: tlk43320341_01_msg0001
rows.name:
My, you have an awful lot of
Blades with you, don't you?

rows.label: tlk43320341_01_msg0002
rows.name:
Looks like your weapon
skills are a bit basic right
now though, am I right?

rows.label: tlk43320341_01_msg0003
rows.name:
If you stick with the same weapon
throughout a lot of battles, then
your skill with it is sure to grow!

rows.label: tlk43320341_01_msg0004
rows.name:
I'm sure it'll make your
Arts a lot stronger, too.

rows.label: tlk43320341_01_msg0005
rows.name:
So don't forget to always think
about each Blade's weapon class
when you're choosing a partner!
